about_the_game:
Venus has its deadly charm, but will you be able to harvest its resources? Be quick or loose access to this whole new planet to your competitors.
Venus Next expands your games by adding a new optional secondary mechanic focused on the exploitation of the Morning Star. The World Government has spoken, Venus is also to be terraformed whilst you’re at it! Build flying cities, make the atmosphere breathable and take advantage of new ways to raise your terraforming rating. Take Terraforming Mars to even further stars with:

• 49 new project cards optionally added to the main deck
• 5 new corporations such as the mighty Aphrodite or the floater oriented Celestic
• Two new resources: Floaters and “Wild”
• The new Hoverlord milestone and Venusphile award
• The Venus board, with its own parameter, tiles and way to earn terraforming rating
• The optional new Solar Phase, increasing a chosen parameter each generation for faster games
